mapper.select: select userName, userEmail, phoneNum, birth, gender, permission from users;
select a.userEmail ,a.userName ,a.phoneNum ,a.birth ,a.gender ,a.nickname ,b.loginDate ,a.userPw from users as a inner join loginlog as b on a.userEmail=b.userEmail
mapper.update: UPDATE USERS set permission="Y" where userEmail=#{userEmail};
